dotnetType.name: IntegerDeserializerBuilderCase
dotnetType.summary:
A deserializer builder case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.IntSchema" /> or <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.LongSchema" />
            and attempts to map them to any provided type.

overloads.summary: Creates a new integer deserializer builder case.

returns.summary:
A successful result if the schema is an <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.IntSchema" /> or a <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.LongSchema" />;
            an unsuccessful result otherwise.

overloads.summary: Builds an integer deserializer for a type-schema pair.
The codec that generated deserializers should use for read operations.

typeSignatures.value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit IntegerDeserializerBuilderCase extends Chr.Avro.Serialization.BinaryDeserializerBuilderCase
